mean_cn: n. 秘书，书记，部长，大臣
mean_en: a person who works in an office, working for another person, dealing with letters and telephone calls, typing, keeping records, arranging meetings with people, etc.
word_etyma: se分开，离开，区别开+cret搞清+ary表名词→秘书
sentence: My secretary helped me with my email.
sentence_trans: 我的秘书正在帮我弄邮件。
